scenarios.title: Giving constructive feedback
scenarios.response: Deliver feedback early, frequently, and with specific examples.
scenarios.question: What's the best way to give feedback to my team?

scenarios.title: Effective 1:1 meetings
scenarios.response: You should schedule fixed time and have a document where you capture notes.
scenarios.question: How can I have effective 1:1s?

scenarios.title: Career development discussions
scenarios.response: Have regular discussions about aspirations and opportunities to grow.
scenarios.question: How should I handle a conversation about someone's career path?

scenarios.title: Setting team goals
scenarios.response: Set clear, measurable goals and revisit them every month.
scenarios.question: How do I set meaningful goals for my team?

scenarios.title: Team motivation
scenarios.response: Understand individual drivers and recognize effort regularly.
scenarios.question: How do I keep my team motivated during tough times?

scenarios.title: Resolving team conflicts
scenarios.response: Address conflicts quickly and privately by focusing on facts and outcomes.
scenarios.question: There is some conflict between two team members. What should I do?

scenarios.title: Building team trust
scenarios.response: Build trust by being consistent, honest, and following through on commitments.
scenarios.question: How do I build trust with my new team?

scenarios.title: Effective delegation
scenarios.response: Delegate based on strengths, not just bandwidth. Provide clarity on ownership.
scenarios.question: What's a good approach to delegation?

scenarios.title: Productive meetings
scenarios.response: Ensure meetings have an agenda and clear action items to avoid time waste.
scenarios.question: How can I make meetings more productive?

scenarios.title: Performance reviews
scenarios.response: Use data and examples to have objective discussions about performance.
scenarios.question: How do I review someone's performance fairly?

scenarios.title: Disagreeing with Sr. Management
scenarios.response: Present alternative solutions with data support, and express disagreement respectfully while showing alignment with company goals.
scenarios.question: How should I disagree with senior leadership?
